financial.description: Czech banking system database with entities for clients, accounts, loans, and transaction history.

table_descriptions.disp: A bridge table connecting clients to accounts that defines the client's privileges and role (e.g., owner or authorized user) on that account.
table_descriptions.trans: The primary transaction ledger recording the full history of financial movements (credits, withdrawals, remittances) for accounts, capturing the operation type, amount, and the post-transaction balance
table_descriptions.order: Registry of permanent payment orders (standing instructions) associated with accounts for recurring payments, specifying the recipient bank, account, and amount.

extra_informations: For this database districts also means location of branch

column_descriptions.order.k_symbol: characterization of the payment, purpose of the payment
column_descriptions.account.frequency: frequency of the account for payment
column_descriptions.disp.type: type of disposition, OWNER, USER, DISPONENT etc.
column_descriptions.loan.payments: Monthly installment amount associated with the loan
column_descriptions.loan.status: Status of the loan repayment (A: Finished OK, B: Finished Unpaid, C: Running OK, D: Running Debt)
column_descriptions.order.account_to: The recipient's account number for the payment order
column_descriptions.order.bank_to: The two-letter code identifying the recipient's bank
column_descriptions.order.amount: The amount of money to be sent in the order
column_descriptions.account.date: The date when the account was opened
column_descriptions.trans.date: The date when the financial transaction occurred
column_descriptions.trans.type: Direction of the transaction flow indicating if it is a Credit or Withdrawal
column_descriptions.trans.operation: The method or mechanism used to execute the transaction (e.g., credit card, cash, bank transfer)
column_descriptions.trans.bank: The code of the partner bank involved in the transaction
